titleStmt.title: The Quakers rejected which was also foretold by a person once eminent among them, taken out of his writings which were published some years ago.
titleStmt.author: Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
Pennyman, Mary, 1630-1701.

notesStmt.note: Letter at end signed: M.P., dated 27 of the month called January, 1676.
Imperfect: stained and torn, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
